Package org.doctag.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectorException
    The class ConnectorException is being used when an error occurred inside a Connector which doesn't directly related to the docTag meta data document or its format.
    DataNotFoundException
    The class DataNotFoundException is being used when no docTag meta data could be found inside another document or a stream.
    InvalidDataException
    The class InvalidDataException is being used when the docTag meta data document contains invalid data and thus cannot be further processed.
